model_answer: The answer is C: [00:01:10 - 00:01:17]. The narrator defines 'General American English' as a dialect commonly used in professional settings between 00:01:10 and 00:01:17.

The correct answer is C: [00:04:57 - 00:05:01]. In the provided segment, the screen shows the “Phonology” title with the IPA symbols /θ/ and /ð/ and an arrow mapping “th” to t/f/d/v.
